reviewtext: My 4 year old loves math so I thought he'd enjoy this game.  He loves it and asks to play all of the time.  The age range is 5+ but I'd recommend it for 4+.To play the game, you roll 3 dice which create an addition or subtraction expression.  The result is the number of spaces you move.  There are also "evens" and "odds" spaces on the board.If you want math practice for your child in a fun way, this is one way to do it.
summary: A fun way to practice addition & subtraction
